flawed_nl_solution:
When they covered 1/4 of the total distance, they were 1/4 * 200 = <<1/4*200=800>>800 miles away from the starting point.
The total distance remaining is 200 - 800 = <<200-800=-600>>-600 miles.
If they took 1 hour to travel 800 miles, their speed was 800/1 = <<800/1=800>>800 miles per hour.
If Roger was driving at 800 miles per hour, then the total time it took him to travel -600 miles is -600/800 = <<-600/800=-3/4>>-3/4 hours.
The total amount of time taken for the whole journey is -3/4 + 1 + 1= 5/4 hours.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 50, not 800. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
